settings.title: Jasion Brand Story
settings.content:
Jasion is a premier online destination for cutting-edge electric bicycles, dedicated to transforming the way individuals experience and embrace eco-friendly commuting. With a passion for innovation and sustainability, we have emerged as a trusted name in the electric bicycle industry.

Embrace a healthier lifestyle with the exhilarating workout experience of Jasion E-Bikes! Effortlessly blend fitness into your daily routine as you pedal your way to vitality. Jasion offers a dynamic and enjoyable exercise, making each ride a fitness adventure. Elevate your well-being with the joy of powered pedaling!

settings.title: All-Terrain Commuting
settings.content: Explore our diverse range of electric bicycles, meticulously designed to cater to various lifestyles and preferences. From sleek urban commuters to robust off-road adventurers, each model reflects our commitment to quality, performance, and customer satisfaction.

settings.title: Tight Control of the Production Process
settings.content: Exercising rigorous oversight throughout the production chain, we meticulously manage every stage, from raw material acquisition to final assembly, ensuring an integrated and tightly controlled manufacturing process.

settings.title: Technological Innovation
settings.content: At the forefront of progress, we are dedicated to pioneering technological innovations that elevate our electric bicycles, embodying our commitment to staying ahead in the dynamic landscape of electric transportation.

settings.title: Consistent Quality
settings.content: Our unwavering dedication to maintaining consistent quality standards defines our ethos, guaranteeing that every electric bicycle leaving our facility meets the highest benchmarks for performance, durability, and overall excellence.

settings.title: Brand Reputation
settings.content: With a sterling reputation built on trust, reliability, and customer satisfaction, our brand stands as a symbol of integrity and commitment in the electric bicycle industry.

settings.subheading: The Dawn of Our Brand, Pioneering Your Ride
settings.title: Jasion EB7 1.0
settings.content: Jasion EB7 1.0 marks the inception of our brand, serving as a trailblazer in the realm of cycling and embodying a yearning for unknown adventures. From this point forward, we present to you a series of exhilarating innovations, top-notch quality, and a redefined riding experience. Let's collectively embark on a new era of electric bikes, exploring uncharted territories and pushing the boundaries further.

settings.title: Jasion EB7 2.0
settings.content: Explore urban landscapes with the EB7 2.0 electric bike. With an 850W motor, 20"x3" wide tires, and dual shock absorbers, it delivers a smooth and powerful ride. Choose between low and high frames for a personalized commuting experience.

settings.title: Jasion EB7 ST
settings.content: In order to cater to a broader audience, we introduce the all-new EB7 ST with a lower frame, unleashing unique style and exceptional performance. The lower seat height not only provides a more relaxed riding experience for women but also sets a new standard for urban commuting. The EB7 ST achieves a harmonious blend of power and elegance, delivering not only robust performance but also conveying a distinctive sense of style.

settings.subheading: Pioneering the Era of Full Suspension Electric Bikes
settings.title: Jasion X-Hunter
settings.content: X-Hunter marks our first stride into the realm of off-road adventures—a rugged and durable companion for your explorations. This brand-new electric bike comes equipped with a robust 1400W motor, 20"x4" wide tires, and full suspension, ensuring a thrilling yet comfortable riding experience on any terrain. This high-performance electric bike seamlessly blends primal power with outstanding shock absorption, unleashing your spirit of adventure and redefining your off-road journey.
